snippet: Representative Zoe Lofgren, a Democrat from California, called the seizure of Dajaz1.com for more than a year "an outrageous abuse of the First Amendment"; also, the F.C.C. rejected Liberty Media's claim of de facto control of Sirius XM Radio.
abstract: Representative Zoe Lofgren, a Democrat from California, called the seizure of Dajaz1.com for more than a year "an outrageous abuse of the First Amendment"; also, the F.C.C. rejected Liberty Media's claim of de facto control of Sirius XM Radio.

headline.main: Digital Notes: Lawmaker Condemns Seizure of Hip-Hop Blog
